title: COPT Defense Acquires 142,000 Square Foot Building in Chantilly, VA
summary: COLUMBIA, Md.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--COPT Defense Properties (NYSE: CDP) (COPT Defense or the Company) announced the acquisition of Stonegate I, a 142,000 square foot Class A office building at 15050 Conference Center Drive in Chantilly, VA for a gross purchase price of $40.2 million. The Class A office building is fully occupied by a top 20 U.S. Defense Contractor with 10 years of lease term remaining, making this their ninth location in the Companys portfolio.
